items.title: US kills 14 in strikes on four alleged drug boats in Pacific
items.description: Mexico's navy is searching for the sole survivor of the latest attack on boats the US says were carrying drugs in both the Pacific and Caribbean.

items.title: Brigitte Macron's life 'deteriorated' after alleged cyber-bullying, daughter says
items.description: Tiphaine Auzière was testifying in the trial of ten people accused of cyber-bullying her mother, the French first lady.

items.title: Russian forces gain foothold in strategic Ukrainian town
items.description: Ukraine's president confirms Russian soldiers have taken up position inside the town of Pokrovsk.

items.title: Texas attorney general sues Tylenol makers over autism claims
items.description: He accuses them of hiding alleged dangers from the drug, following the Trump administration's unproven claim it is linked to autism.

items.title: Pregnant British teenager's family pay £137,000 to reduce sentence in Georgia jail
items.description: The pregnant 19-year-old faces drugs charges in Georgia and is back in court on Monday.
